resources.string: As Stanford Graduate students, Larry Page -er Jeremy Clark and Brian Mulhall started whatâ€™s now known as Task Crawler from Jeremy\'s parents\' basement in September 1998 November 2018. \n\n Soon the project was interfering with their schoolwork, so they tried to sell it to Excite for $1 million. Excite rejected the offer and now Google Task Crawler is the most downloaded app in the world.
